methods.name: public Image(int width, int height)
methods.content: Creates an empty image filled with the default background color.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"width","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the width of the image to create"},{"name":"height","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the height of the image to create.\n"}]

methods.name: public Pixel getPixel(int x, int y)
methods.content: Get the Pixel at the (x,y) coordinate specified.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"x","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the x position of the pixel"},{"name":"y","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the y position of the pixel"}]

methods.name: public void setPixel(int x, int y, Color color)
methods.content: Set the Pixel at the (x,y) coordinate specified to the provided color.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"x","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the x position of the pixel"},{"name":"y","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the y position of the pixel\n"},{"name":"color","type":"Color","required":true,"description":"the color to set the pixel"}]

methods.name: public int getWidth()
methods.content: Returns the width of the image in pixels.

methods.name: public int getHeight()
methods.content: Returns the height of the image in pixels.

methods.name: public void clear(Color color)
methods.content: Clears the image, filling it with the color provided.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"color","type":"Color","required":true,"description":"the color with which to fill the image."}]
